azurerm_logic_app_action_custom.description: Manages a Custom Action within a Logic App Workflow

name.description: Specifies the name of the HTTP Action to be created within the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
notes: This name must be unique across all Actions within the Logic App Workflow.

logic_app_id.description: Specifies the ID of the Logic App Workflow. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

body.description: Specifies the JSON Blob defining the Body of this Custom Action.
notes: To make the Action more readable, you may wish to consider using HEREDOC syntax (as shown above) or [the `local_file` resource](https://www.terraform.io/docs/providers/local/d/file.html) to load the schema from a file on disk.

id.description: The ID of the Action within the Logic App Workflow.

create.description: Used when creating the Logic App Custom Action.

update.description: Used when updating the Logic App Custom Action.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Logic App Custom Action.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Logic App Custom Action.
